properties.name: Bay 66 Skate Park
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada  London\'s only pay-to-skate skate park

properties.name: Bay 66 skatepark
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada Under the westway flyover, London\'s main facility. Big street course area, mini ramp, midi ramp and vert halpipe. Constantly changing obstacles. Pay to use. Go to: http://www.baysixty6.com/html_v1/ for opening times and prices.

properties.name: Big Ben road gap
properties.description: Posted by JahladaVery well known small road gap

properties.name: Big bank with ledge on top
properties.description: Posted by JahladaSee Louie Jones\' last trick in Heroin\'s Live From Antarctica. This place is a bust as it\'s in full view of security hut in the car park.

properties.description: Posted by JahladaAmazing spot, a complete bust

properties.description: Posted by JahladaWell known but hard to skate. High pink hubba style ledge on right side of stairs.

properties.name: Buckingham Palace fountains
properties.description: Posted by JahladaTight transitioned banks skateable when the fountains are drained. High chance of getting busted.

properties.name: Cantelowes skatepark

properties.name: London Fields
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada  Strange tarmac lumps

properties.name: London skate plaza
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada  Under cover skate park designed and built by The Side Effects Of Urethane crew. Good variety of transitions and ledges in an unusual but fun layout.

properties.name: Lordship Lane skatepark
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada Two humps and a bowled out quarter pipe bit. Couple of grind ledges and that\'s it. Very small but perfectly smooth and quite fun. Free to use.

properties.description: Posted by Jahlada  A skate park of sorts

properties.name: Meanwhile Gardens skatepark
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada Three different sized bowls linked together. Good hips, good coping, good fun. Free to use.

properties.name: Meanwhile II
properties.description: Posted by JahladaA bowled out banked area and non bowled banked area separated by the famous "Gonz Gap". Small street area too with obstacles made by local skaters. Under the westway flyover. Free to use.

properties.name: Meanwhile bowls
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada  Three bowls, lots of fun, free

properties.description: Posted by JahladaThe most skated rail in London?

properties.name: Mudchute Skate Park
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada  The funnest skate park in London

properties.name: Mudchute skatepark
properties.description: Posted by Jahlada Small strange skatepark but probably the most fun of all of London\'s skateparks on a sunny day. Little kickers, a decent hip, good transitions. Great. Free to use.
